inclusion.criterion: Histologically proven NHL, and for which intensive chemotherapy is considered
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Serum creatinine ≦1.5 mg/dl Blood urea nitrogen (BUN) ≦ 25 mg/dl
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with history of brain metastasis or CNS involvement.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Child's class B or C in patients with liver cirrhosis.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Impaired cardiac function with NYHA (New York Heart Association) classification ≧ GrII.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has been treating with corticosteroid and cyclophosphamides since 4 months ago. His Birmingham Vasculitis Activity Score (BVAS) is above 4.
